<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">be32625c8622021024cfd392f893f4c1</macroponent><name>OnSubmit</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Required fields cannot be empty",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let startDate = new Date(api.data.report_emergency.nowRecordFormBlob.fields.start_date.value);
    let endDate = new Date(api.data.report_emergency.nowRecordFormBlob.fields.end_date.value);
    let othersAffected = api.data.report_emergency.nowRecordFormBlob.fields.were_other_employees_affected_by_this_emergency.value;
    var mandatoryFields = [];
    if(othersAffected == 'true'){
        mandatoryFields.push("who_else_was_affected");
    }
    (api.data.report_emergency.nowRecordFormBlob.fieldElements).forEach(function(property) {
        if (property.dictionary.isMandatory == true) {
            mandatoryFields.push(property.name);
        }
    });
    if (mandatoryFields) {
        let count = 0;
        mandatoryFields.forEach(function(property) {
            if (!api.data.report_emergency.nowRecordFormBlob.fields[property].value) {
                count++;
                helpers.translate("Required fields cannot be empty").then(value => {
                    api.data.report_emergency.showFieldMessage({
                        fieldName: property,
                        message: value,
                        type: "error"
                    });
                });
            }
        });
        if (count) {
            return;
        }
    }
    /*if (endDate.getTime() < startDate.getTime()) {
        helpers.translate("End date should not be less than start date").then(value => {
            api.data.report_emergency.showFieldMessage({
                fieldName: "end_date",
                message: value,
                type: "error"
            });
        });
        return;
    }*/

    api.data.report_emergency.setValue({
        "fieldName": "status",
        "value": "submitted"
    });
    api.data.report_emergency.save();
    const route = "home";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            reportSubmitted: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });


}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>be32625c1b220210ada4a61ebe1a40be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OnSubmit</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_be32625c1b220210ada4a61ebe1a40be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:27</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
